EventStory.Headline: Edited Transcript of RCII.OQ M&A conference call or presentation 21-Dec-20 1:30pm GMT
EventStory.Body:
Rent-A-Center Inc Definitive Agreement To Acquire Acima Conference Call & Webcast
PLANO Dec 21, 2020 (Thomson StreetEvents) -- Edited Transcript of Rent-A-Center Inc M&A conference call or presentation Monday, December 21, 2020 at 1:30:00pm GMT
TEXT version of Transcript

Event.eventTitle: Rent-A-Center Inc Definitive Agreement To Acquire Acima Conference Call & Webcast
